lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.

At a party at the house of one of your friends, Mark Powers (a.k.a. "The Most Incredible Hunk In The Ninth Grade") asks you to be his partner in a game that some of the kids are playing. The game is called "Seven Minutes In Heaven."

All of the "couples" find a place to be comfortable in a very large room. Someone is in charge of working the lights. When the lights go out, the couples make out (and stuff) for seven minutes. When the lights get turned back on,
the couples can either stay with each other or switch partners.
The two of you get comfortable, and the lights go off. Mark pulls you close and presses his lips against yours. You can:
#KISS HIM FOR A BIT MORE BEFORE TRYING ANYTHING ELSE
What do you decide to do?
#TRY TO GET HIM TO TOUCH YOU ON THE OUTSIDE OF YOUR SHIRT

All of a sudden Mark pulls away. He stutters and says, "I gotta go get a soda. I'll be right back." He looks scared to death. The next day, you find out that he has told everyone he could have had his way with you.

You place his hand on your shirt, thinking it will please him. Instead, he looks like he gets into a panic. He stutters and says, "I gotta go get a soda. I'll be right back." The next day, you find out that he told all of his friends
that he had his way with you."

That stuff only works on T.V. and in cheap novels. You treat his ear as if it were a piece of dried fruit. "Yeeeeeeech! That's disGUSTing," Mark cries out. Your "Seven Minutes in Heaven" are brought to an abrupt end.
As you kiss him, you feel him moving close to you, pressing himself up against you. You can:
#LET HIM TOUCH YOU ON THE OUTSIDE OF YOUR SHIRT
#EXCUSE YOURSELF SAYING, "I JUST REMEMBERED SOMETHING I GOTTA DO."
You are overwhelmed and afraid that you will not be able to handle what could come next. Mark looks confused as you head for the door. The next day, he tells everyone that he "felt you up."
His hands slide up and down your shirt and brush across your leg. You can:
#EXCUSE YOURSELF SAYING, "I JUST REMEMBERED SOMETHING I GOTTA DO."
#LET HIM TO TOUCH YOU ON THE OUTSIDE OF YOUR BLOUSE
He pulls your shirt out of your pants and runs his hands up and down your chest. He kisses you on the neck... and then reaches for the snap on your jeans.

LIGHTS ON! You look up at Mark. You try to regain your composure. Mark asks if he can get you a soda. You expect that when he comes back, he will finish what he started. Your heart is pounding wildly.
You think to yourself, "It's only a few minutes until the next round." Mark returns with Lucy "Loose" Garfield. As she passes by, she asks, "Who are YOU gonna be with next?"

You are obviously not interested in a seven-minute affair with Mark. You are much too sophisticated for that. Besides, who wants to kiss someone who has had fifteen other people slobbering all over his face all night?
